Synopsis: Add an email address for the authenticated user
Description: This endpoint is accessible with the `user` scope.
Notes: [Add an email address for the authenticated user](https://docs.github.com/rest/users/emails#add-an-email-address-for-the-authenticated-user)

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
Add-GitHubUserEmail -Email 'octocat@github.com','firstname.lastname@work.com'
Adds the email addresses `octocat@github.com` and `firstname.lastname@work.com` to the authenticated user's account.
